mapper.select: select * from page_conn_history where pch_reg_dt between #{start_dt} and #{end_dt}
select * from member_prod_history where mph_reg_dt between #{start_dt} and #{end_dt}

select scd_mi_seq, scd_pi_seq , sum(scd_count) as buy_quantity, avg(scd_count) as buy_quantity_avg, count(*) as buy_frequncy from (select * from shopping_cart_data where scd_status = #{status} and scd_mod_dt between #{start_dt} and #{end_dt}) a group by scd_mi_seq, scd_pi_seq
select pi_seq, pi_name, cate_name, mfi_name from product_detail_info where pi_release_date between #{start_dt} and #{end_dt};
